p.b: The word root has more than one meaning.

questionBody.p: Choose the sentence in which root means "to move things around while looking for something."

simpleChoice.p: Having the wrong ingredients was the root of my problem when I made that recipe.
I plan to root for my favorite team, even if I think they will lose.
He had to root in the drawer to find the right pen.
The tree root grew up through the sidewalk.
